title: `support.archives.unixify_path()` has type issue on Windows

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
More tests fail, but it is always this traceback tail.
```
[00:15:30] ======================================================================
[00:15:30] ERROR: datalad.tests.test_archives.test_compress_file('.tar',)
[00:15:30] ----------------------------------------------------------------------
[00:15:30] Traceback (most recent call last):
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
[00:15:30]     self.test(*self.arg)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 499, in newfunc
[00:15:30]     return t(*(arg + (d,)), **kw)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\utils.py", line 669, in newfunc
[00:15:30]     return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\tests\test_archives.py", line 92, in check_compress_file
[00:15:30]     decompress_file(archive, name_extracted, leading_directories='strip')
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\archives.py", line 141, in decompress_file
[00:15:30]     patoolib._extract_archive(unixify_path(archive),
[00:15:30]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\archives.py", line 107, in unixify_path
[00:15:30]     path_ = path_.split(os.sep)
[00:15:30] TypeError: a bytes-like object is required, not 'str'

```
